item.title: BeLE - Hardwear.io 2022
item.author: cryptax
item.description: BeLE - Hardwear.io CTF 2022 The challenge is named “BeLE” and says there are several BLE devices + provides a Bluetooth PCAP file. PCAP file The PCAP file is small with only 5 packets. The first packet is a BLE Read Request to read the BLE characteristic with handle 0x2a 02 10 00 07 00 03 00 04 00 0a 2a 00 The second packet is a BLE Read Response.
